/// ---------------------------------------
Hi! What's up? Hello!
Hello! How are you?
/// ---------------------------------------
I’m the Panfishbee and I love helping people when thye are in jeopardy.
Oh so great! So are you something like a superhero? Do you feel happy about your job?
Not exactly, but I do my best, every single time, in case to save the world. Wow! How do you move with this tail? And let me ask you something more.
Firstly, it’s not a job! It’s a way of life, and I really love my “job” so I’m not tired at all and every single day I feel happier. Keep up the good "work". Just kidding! I love what you do. It was great to meet you!
/// ---------------------------------------
My powers start when I’m out on water. Oh! I want to see it, let's go find some water!
/// ---------------------------------------
Yes, of course! You can ask whatever you really want, I am available to answer everything. Cool!
/// --------------------------------------------------------------------- /// dialogue items when given stuff from inventory
I don't really need that but thanks. Mmm ... no. Nope. Nope. Nope.
No? Really? ... I'm a little sad now.
That's cool! Thank you! Thanks! Oh, how nice of you! Thanks!
No problem.
Awesome! Thank you! I needed this! I've always wanted one of these! I love it! Thank you!
Hey, no problem at all! Glad you like it!
